title: MPs Take Up Partygate Inquiry
itunes:title: MPs Take Up Partygate Inquiry
description:
Conservative MP Richard Holden says the parliamentary inquiry into the 'partygate' scandal will need to examine fresh reports of events in Downing Street during Covid-19 restrictions. He tells Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Stephen Carroll that if the Privileges Committee finds Boris Johnson misled parliament, the Prime Minister will have to go. Also in the show, journalist Simon Kuper discusses his new book, which examines how Oxford graduates came to dominate the highest levels of British politics.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
